Title: Relates to establishing a remote maternal health services pilot program for Medicaid recipients
Summary: Relates to establishing a remote maternal health services pilot program for Medicaid recipients; provides that such program shall be established during fiscal years 2025-2026, 2026-2027 and 2027-2028 to provide: remote maternal health services to eligible Medicaid recipients, medically necessary remote maternal health services to such eligible recipients for up to 12 months postpartum and payment to healthcare providers who provide remote maternal health services.
LawCode: Add ยง365-kk, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to establishing a remote maternal health services pilot program for Medicaid recipients
